title: "Resting-State Neural Activity across Face-Selective Cortical Regions Is Behaviorally Relevant"
excerpt: "Interest has increased recently in correlations across brain regions in the resting-state fMRI blood oxygen level-dependent (BOLD) response, but little is known about the functional significance of these correlations."
